answers.question: What kinds of contact details are available for each office?
answers.answer: For each office, telephone/phone numbers, fax numbers, and email addresses are available as contact details.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/regional-centers-for-procedures-and-accommodation-for-asylum-seekers and read the page carefully.

answers.question: What are the names of the locations or regions where these offices are situated?
answers.answer: The offices are situated in the locations or regions named Rădăuți, Maramureș, Galați, București, Timișoara, and Giurgiu.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/regional-centers-for-procedures-and-accommodation-for-asylum-seekers and read the page carefully.

answers.question: How are the various offices geographically described or contextualized?
answers.answer: The offices are geographically contextualized by their proximity to various borders or regions: Rădăuți (next to Chernivtsi Oblast), Maramureș (next to Zakarpattia and Ivano-Frankivsk Oblasts), Galați (next to Odessa Oblast), Timișoara (next to the Romanian-Hungarian border), and Giurgiu (next to the Romanian-Bulgarian border). București is described as the capital city of Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/regional-centers-for-procedures-and-accommodation-for-asylum-seekers and read the page carefully.
